title: 23 Powerful Sage Prayers to Clear Negative Energy

steps.title: Smudging prayer to remove negative energy
steps.content: Smudging prayer to remove negative energy Great Spirit, with the smoke of this sage, cleanse this space of any negativity, replacing it with pure, positive energy. Let all that is not serving the highest good be released, and allow peace and harmony to fill this area. Thank you. This is one of the most common smudge stick prayers for clearing your house of negative energy. It’s equally important to invite in positive energy, especially if you’re trying to move past uncomfortable guests or experiences that took place there.

steps.title: Smudge stick house cleansing prayer
steps.content: Smudge stick house cleansing prayer I command any negativity, any low vibrational energy, and non-benevolent beings within this space to leave and go to the light. You are not welcome here. I command you to leave through an open window (or door) and return from whence you came to be transformed to light energy. I call upon the element of air to carry my words across space and time, so that they may reach all corners of this home and beyond. I call upon the element of fire to burn away all negative and stagnant energy that has been left behind by those who have entered into this space. I call upon the element of earth to absorb all traces of negative energy that may linger on in this space so that no trace remains after we have cleansed our home with smoke. I call upon the element of water to wash away any lingering negativity or thoughtforms associated with others who have lived here before us - and bring peace, tranquility, and unconditional love back into our lives again. Choose this cleansing prayer to rid your home of any unwanted spirits if you think your house feels haunted. It’s also helpful for a fresh start when you move into any very old house that carries the heavy energy of those who lived there before.

steps.title: Sage house blessing for a new home
steps.content: Sage house blessing for a new home Release any negativity, density, or attachments into the light. Help me shine with higher vibrations and guide me with a team of Angels and guides. I open this space to love and enter all positive energy into my space. Come into it with nurturing energy, compassion, love, and truth. Make your new house your own by performing this smudge stick prayer to clear any negative or foreign energy from the space.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer to sell a home
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer to sell a home I give my gratitude to this home for creating a container that held me and watched me grow over the past [#] years. I honor the completion of our karmic cycle together and I call in the next cycle that is aligned with my highest spirit and the highest spirit of this home. May we call in the person who is in perfect alignment to tend to this space. May this next cycle be of benefit to all involved. This prayer sends positive energy into the world so the perfect person can become the next owner of your happy home.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for compassion and love
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for compassion and love I open this space to divine love, may all the energy that flows through here benefit the heart space. May it hold compassion, nurturance, forgiveness, and truth. If you’ve experienced hurtful emotions within your home, this prayer can help welcome forgiveness and compassion for those who live there.

steps.title: Short and simple smudge stick prayer
steps.content: Short and simple smudge stick prayer Creator please help to protect and bless this space from negative energies. And help us create a home that is peaceful and joyful for me and my family. If you’re short on time, this short and sweet prayer asks for the space to be blessed and rid of any negative energy for yourself and your family.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for a sacred space
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for a sacred space Negativity of this my sacred space, I banish you by the light of my grace, You have no hold or power here, I stand and face you with no fear, Be gone forever you will obey, From my sacred space, you must away. You can perform this heightened version of a home cleansing prayer that not only pushes out negative energy but also regards your space as sacred.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for gratitude
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for gratitude We smudge with these sacred medicines to cleanse all of the spiritual energy that is occupying this house. We are very grateful to be able to use them to purify the space and communicate with you. Show your beloved home how thankful you are to live there with this prayer for gratitude. It works to purify the space and connect to any positive energies that exist there.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer to elevate positive energy
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer to elevate positive energy Release any negativity, density, or attachments, into the light to help me shine with the highest promising vibration and embrace the highest authenticity. If anything is not aligned with this highest light and truth, let it be emptied and released into the divine light. Thank you for helping me cleanse my energy and elevate my vibrations in the past. I can brightly shine, radiantly love, happily live, and thrive in sheer alignment with sole purpose and mission according to the will of the divine. I thank the Palo Santo and sage for the services they offered me and for the service of the entire team of Angels, guides, and Ascended Masters. Thank you for pursuing and allowing me to stay connected, clear, and vibrantly shining. This is the ultimate prayer for cleansing yourself of negative energy. It speaks directly to the divine to ask that your energy reaches the highest vibrations and leaves anything negative behind. You can choose palo santo or sage to perform this ritual that mentions them in its words.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for cleansing the mind
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for cleansing the mind I ask for clear communication between myself and my body, mind, and spirit so that I may live in harmony with myself and those around me. Clear any negative thoughts within my mind and heart space. This prayer is focused on harmony within yourself and your mind. Your mind is like your home; it needs to be de-cluttered sometimes with these words to help clear your intellectual energy.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for ceremonial cleansing
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for ceremonial cleansing May your hands be cleansed, that they create beautiful things. May your feet be cleansed, so that they might take you where you most need to be. May your heart be cleansed, so that you might hear its messages clearly. May your throat be cleansed, so that you might speak rightly when words are needed. May your eyes be cleansed, so that you might see the signs and wonders of the world. May this person and space be washed clean by the smoke of these fragrant plants. And may that same smoke carry our prayers, spiraling, to the heavens. This formal prayer mentions different parts of your body to ceremonially cleanse each one so you properly go out into the world with a clean spirit.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer to raise consciousnesses
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer to raise consciousnesses May all the positive vibes of the magnificent universe that surrounds you bring peace to your mind, flow through your blood, and fill your space with love and serenity. By raising your consciousness you can cleanse yourself of anything negative while inviting peace, love, and serenity into your being.

steps.title: Palo Santo smudge stick prayer
steps.content: Palo Santo smudge stick prayer Enter into my space and time. I call back and forth the consciousness of the sage and Palo Santo, in conjunction with my almighty guide, to fully clean my energy and all negativity, to purify and release any density, or anything that no longer exists or serves. Release negative energy into the divine light. Use woody aromatic Palo Santo to properly perform this prayer to purify the energy in and around you. It burns similarly to sage or other smudge sticks but focuses more on inviting positive energy than freeing a space of negative energy.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer to invite productivity
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer to invite productivity I call in the divine abundance of creativity, inspiration, and productivity. May the [project, artwork, contract, etc.] I feel within my heart come to fruition in a form that benefits my highest good. May it be manifested into the form that best expresses its truth. Use this very specific prayer to energize your creative spirit toward a goal, whether a piece of art, professional project, or personal dream.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for breaking curses
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for breaking curses Great Spirit, I am confronting so many trembling situations in life. The circumstances have been affecting my parents and ancestors. You're the holy spirits and have all the powers to bind command and break the holds of generational curses. I beg you to destroy and purge the weaknesses and curses that have been there through blood from one generation to another. Move back in time to rid your family line of any dark or negative energy you may hold. Whether escaping a curse or familial karmic struggle, you can free yourself of that obstacle in your own life.

steps.title: White sage prayer for physical vitality
steps.content: White sage prayer for physical vitality May the sage smoke carry away my ailments and bring renewed strength to my body and soul. Fill me with your healing power. If you’ve gone through a health issue or injury, this white sage prayer can inspire you to find strength and energy again; you can focus on doing all the healing you need to feel better.

steps.title: Sage prayer for money
steps.content: Sage prayer for money As the smoke of this sage cleanses the space around me, may it also clear any negative energy blocking my abundance, attracting positive financial flow and prosperity into my life. Guide me to wise decisions and opportunities that support my financial well-being. This prayer is all about abundance in the form of money and wealth; by clearing any energetic obstacles, you can open yourself up to more positive financial influence in your life.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for love
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for love As I cleanse this space with the smoke of this sacred herb, I open my heart to receive the love I seek. May this smoke carry away any negativity that blocks love from entering my life, and draw in a partner who is aligned with my highest good. I am ready to embrace love in all its forms, with an open heart and a clear mind. If you’re looking for love, say this smudge stick prayer to remove any energetic obstacles from your heart; the idea is to clear your spirit so the right romantic partner comes into your life.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for another person
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for another person Great Spirit, as I cleanse this space with the smoke of this sacred herb, I ask that you also cleanse the energy of [person's name], removing any negativity and replacing it with peace, love, and healing light. May they be surrounded by positive vibrations and feel renewed in body, mind, and spirit. Just as you can cleanse a home or yourself, this prayer aims to replace negative energy with positive for someone you know and care about. They don’t need to be physically present if you set your intention on reaching out to them.

steps.title: Smudge stick prayer for protection
steps.content: Smudge stick prayer for protection Spirit of the sacred smoke, cleanse this space and surround me with a shield of light, protecting me from negativity and harm. May this smoke carry away any unwanted energies, and leave me feeling safe and secure within this space. Thank you. Instead of simply cleansing the space, this prayer asks for protection so your home is safeguarded against negative energies.

steps.title: White sage prayer for protection and energy
steps.content: White sage prayer for protection and energy Into this smoke, I release all energies that do not serve me, all negativity that surrounds me, and all fears that limit me, so it is. White sage prayers are best performed using white sage, which was part of Native American smudging rituals. It’s primarily used to gain spiritual purification and protect against negative forces.

steps.title: Native American smudging prayer for protection
steps.content: Native American smudging prayer for protection Oh, Great Spirit, Whose voice I hear in the winds and whose breath gives life to all the world. Hear me! I need your strength and wisdom. Let me walk in beauty, and make my eyes ever hold the red and purple sunset. Make my hands respect the things you have made and my ears sharp to hear your voice. Make me wise so that I may understand the things you have taught my people. Let me learn the lessons you have hidden in every leaf and rock. Help me remain calm and strong in the face of all that comes towards me. Help me find compassion without empathy overwhelming me. I seek strength, not to be greater than my brother, but to fight my greatest enemy: myself. Make me always ready to come to you with clean hands and straight eyes. So when life fades, as the fading sunset, my spirit may come to you without shame. [1] X Research source This famous smudging prayer was translated by Lakota Sioux Chief Yellow Lark in 1887. It’s used to protect against negativity while inviting in positive vibes, strength, and confidence in everything you do.

steps.title: Catholic smudging prayer
steps.content: Catholic smudging prayer Lord, I ask that You purify my home and bless every corner with Your presence. Cleanse the space of any negativity, harmful energies, or distractions. May my home become a sanctuary of peace, love, and protection. Let Your Holy Spirit fill every room and create an atmosphere of harmony and joy. I ask that You place Your angels around my home, keeping it safe from all harm and evil. Let Your peace reign here always. Amen. [2] X Research source While this Catholic smudge stick prayer is used to cleanse a space, it asks God for love and protection. By reciting the prayer, you can seek the light of God’s energy so your home becomes a happy, peaceful place to live.

steps.title: Gather a sage stick, a fireproof bowl, and a lighter or matches.
steps.content: Gather a sage stick, a fireproof bowl, and a lighter or matches. One sage smudge stick should be enough when saying a prayer for cleansing . Before you smudge a house , choose a fireproof container that’s heat resistant. A shell works, but a small cast-iron pan is also an option. Decide on matches or a lighter as your fire source; a lighter tends to be easier when moving around a home while burning sage. [3] X Research source Some alternatives to sage include cedar (associated with longevity) a lemony juniper herb, or Palo Santo (an aromatic wood referred to as “holy wood”), which cleanses energies and invites healing.

steps.title: Declutter the space for cleansing.
steps.content: Declutter the space for cleansing. Clear any clutter or mess around your home, so nothing blocks your path. Open your windows and curtains to clear negative energy . It’s very important to allow any negative energy to exit the home and invite new fresh air in before performing a cleansing new home ritual. Remove any distractions to create a peaceful environment. Turn your cell phone off and shut off any other electric or communication devices you have. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Set your intention.
steps.content: Set your intention. Before you light the smudge stick, close your eyes and focus on what you hope to gain with your smudging ritual. Concentrate on the positive elements you want to invite into your life or home. You can also name the negative things you want to be rid of, like sickness, bad luck, or evil. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Light the smudge stick and waft the smoke through each room in the house.
steps.content: Light the smudge stick and waft the smoke through each room in the house. Light the thickest end until it catches fire and then blow out the flame. Wave the smudge stick up and down while moving through rooms, including corners. You can use a smudging feather or simply your hand. [6] X Research source Smudge every room in the house, including closets. Don’t forget the laundry room, garage, and basement. Say or meditate on your chosen prayer while you move through the house to invoke its energy all over. In addition to saying prayers, you can also focus positive energy on the act of cleansing using the intention you originally set for yourself. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Why do we smudge?
steps.content: Why do we smudge? Smudging is a traditional ritual performed by several indigenous peoples across the world to cleanse a particular space to bring them closer to the divine. It’s also used to rid oneself of negative energies while inviting in positive ones, like love, compassion, and productivity. [8] X Research source

steps.title: How do you use smudge sticks on yourself?
steps.content: How do you use smudge sticks on yourself? You can perform a ritual to cleanse your spirit in the same way you would around a space, only you’d wave the smudge stick towards and around your own body. Start from the top of your head and move your way downward, using each hand when necessary. Concentrate the smoke towards your heart as a focal point to invite in positive energy and cleanse your aura . [9] X Research source

steps.title: When is the best time to smudge your home?
steps.content: When is the best time to smudge your home? Some believe that morning is a better time to smudge your home because the energy of the day hasn’t been set yet. Most agree that, as long as you set your intention, you can smudge your home any time of the day. Follow your intuition as to what feels right to you. [10] X Research source

steps.title: How often should you burn sage?
steps.content: How often should you burn sage? You can burn sage or other smudge sticks any time you feel the need to cleanse energy or bless a house . It’s a good idea when you want to de-clutter your space or set a new intention at home. Burning sage also comes in handy when you’ve just had guests, are in a new home, or want to sell your home. [11] X Research source
